product_name: NYX Professional MakeupLine Loud Longwear Lip Liner
summary: SummaryGet loud with NYX Professional Makeup Line Loud Lip Liner! Infused with jojoba oil and vitamin e for smooth, transfer proof color all day long.
details: DetailsBenefitsMeet the longwear lip pencil that brings loud to any lookInfused with jojoba oil and vitamin e for smoother, never drying lips with a soft matte finishWaterproof, creamy formula glides onto lips with no tug for precise applicationTransfer, fade, and smudge resistant color that stays loud all dayAvailable in 18 shades, this creamy lip liner formula shapes lips and blends easily for no bleed colorTop off your loud look with the fan fav Shine Loud, available in 15 matching shadesNo animal-derived ingredient or by-product)Key IngredientsInfused with jojoba oil and vitamin e for smoother, softer looking lips. Never drying, always comfortable.Item 2595204How To UseUse the tip of the sharpenable lip pencil to outline desired lip shape for no tug, smooth glide, precise application. Use along lip lines or all over lips for full loud color. Pro tip: mismatch your lip look!
how_to_use: Use the tip of the sharpenable lip pencil to outline desired lip shape for no tug, smooth glide, precise application. Use along lip lines or all over lips for full loud color. Pro tip: mismatch your lip look!

reviews.headline: Very nice and creamy lip liner
reviews.comments: It is so nice

reviews.headline: I love it would buy again
reviews.comments: I love this liner I would buy it over and over again I just wish it didn't have to be sharpened.

reviews.headline: Lip liner
reviews.comments: So far it's the best lip liner I've used. Thankful to the associate in the store who recommended it and it was the last one. Matched up well with what I needed it for and it lasts all day.

reviews.headline: Go to lip liner!
reviews.comments: I have continuously repurchased this liner as it's my all time favorite! Perfect nude/brown everyday liner. Super pigmented! It's creamy but it has enough stiffness to not break

reviews.headline: YOURE SUPPOSED TO SHARPEN GUYS
reviews.comments: This is my absolute favorite lip liner of all time I reach for it more than my more expensive MAC ones because they last soooo long! Im a liner and no gloss girl so it doesnt budge! And please please use a sharpener this is not a twist off!

reviews.headline: I will be buying other colors
reviews.comments: Love how this product glides on and love the color. I will definitely be buying some of the other colors.

reviews.headline: Defective
reviews.comments: Screw up type pencil tip broke on first use, then the part used to wind it up just twisted with no results. Going to return it. It was shrink wrapped tightly but defective, so I don't know if I like the color, but I sure don't like the packaging.

reviews.headline: PERFECTION
reviews.comments: I loved it so much it applies so smooth and it's a GORGEOUSSSS COLOR 10\10 recommend ðŸ™Œ

reviews.headline: Will repurchase
reviews.comments: Alot of people say you can sharpen the lip liner cause its plastic, but its totally sharpenable. Its not made out of plastic. Its smudge proof and long wear. Only con is that sometimes the product come completely out and also you dont have enough time to really blend before it sets, but its good.

reviews.headline: Doesn't twist
reviews.comments: Love the color and how smooth it is but it's one time use. Once the tip is gone the pencil doesn't twist anything out and it's plastic so can't sharpen

reviews.headline: Bleeds but good pigmentation
reviews.comments: I was so excited when this product came out and I instantly bought it. First off great pigment really bold and loud like it says, but unfortunately, it does bleed through and it's hard to keep it clean and it's just a mess :(

reviews.headline: Disappointed
reviews.comments: This lipliner has a really good potential, but it breaks too easily. Another thing is i bought it assuming it was twistable, it was not twistable, so i thought "Maybe im supposed to sharpen it", and so i sharpened it only to find out its plastic and i cant sharpen it without it becoming somewhat deforemed"

reviews.headline: Good but not sturdy.
reviews.comments: The liner is nice color but the first time I used it the tip broke.

reviews.headline: Love NYX liners, best product, best shades, best for the mon
reviews.comments: Love these liners, the best

reviews.headline: Nope
reviews.comments: I bought this thinking that you can twist it, but no, it doesnt twist, so i thought oh maybe your supposed to sharpen it, but i realised its plastic, the only reason im giving this product two stars is bc the color is really nice and smooth, and good application, the only thing you need to change nyx is the TWIST

reviews.headline: tip breaks
reviews.comments: Just like all the other reviews my tip broke get it off the market you cant even use it. The wrapping is also hard to get off

reviews.headline: Disappointing
reviews.comments: Couldnt get the lid off after unwrapping once i finally pulled it off the tip flew off and it was broken. The color as pretty at what i could scrape off. Pointless twist up because it did nothing.

reviews.headline: I would not purchase again
reviews.comments: The color is pretty but the tip breaks off easy. Also twisting the bottom for more to come out of the top and nothing comes out. So it's like you're paying for the tip them you can't use anymore. I don't recommend purchasing.

reviews.headline: Depends on the finish
reviews.comments: I find that depending on the finish you go with this lipliner will depend on how long it last. It's okay with the shine loud lipstick (That are literally a god send, i bought about 30 of them now, not just to try different colors restocks) . I would just use those as a lipliner majority of the time. But alas I was out of my beloved lipstick shade total baller. So i got the lipliner. With the gloss it gets almost gummy. I never have that problem with just the lipstick. With the liner it literally pills if i do anything (eat drink purse my lips together). Matte no lipgloss it last fine but its matte so obviously its not very comfy. I havent tested it with a regular lipstick but i can imagine it last similarly to the gloss.

reviews.headline: Lip liner
reviews.comments: 0/10 . As soon as i opened the pencil to apply it the point literally broke & im thinking you can just twist it to get more & no absolutely just wasted my money on it.

media.headline: Stays on!
media.caption: Colors Global Citizen and Goal Crusher

faceoff_positive.comments:
Definitely would recommend this product to my friends. I have this lip liner in 6 different colors and would totally buy more. My friend showed me this liner in the shade rebel kind and I have not turned back to my previous lip liner. The color stays on for a long time, so you don't have to reapply every hour. Also the formula is very creamy.

Downside is that these liners are SHARPENABLE. They do NOT have a swivel, so they aren't retractable. I recommend getting the NYX sharpener. I only sharpened them once so far and it wasnt bad. If you do have issues sharpening try putting the liner in the fridge for a few minutes and it should harden.

Also beware of buying this online because different skin tones affect what the color will actually come out as. Thats why some colors look different on then what the picture shows. I had two colors look a little bit lighter then what I thought I was getting, but they still look good.
faceoff_positive.headline: Best Lip Liner I've ever gotten

faceoff_negative.comments: I recently found a black liquid lipstick that i love, and I'm currently on the hunt for a black lip liner to pair with itâ€¦ let me tell you, this ain't it, sis. This pencil goes on grayâ€¦ if it goes on at all, that is. It loves to go on patchy, clumpy, and inconsistent. I always start my lip looks with a Mac lip primer (it's always worked for me!) but it seems like this lip liner was fighting with my primer every step of the way. I'm usually pretty forgiving when i try new products but after my first failed attempt to use this, i pitched it. :(
faceoff_negative.headline: Makes me very sad. :(
